import userEvent from "@testing-library/user-event"; import React from "react"; import "./style.css"; export default function Confirmation({ user }) { return (
Thank you! Your Order Number is #6268 A confimation email has been sent to {user.email}. Please check your email box.
Customer Infomation
{user.first_name} {user.last_name} {user.email} {user.phone}
Payment Method
{user.first_name} {user.last_name}
); }
